overview: As a tribute to 70's grindhouse cinema, GRIND is a grimy, gritty, nonstop sex fest double feature! There is no plot or pretense, just two rooms packed to the rafters with man on man lust! Shot on location in one night, GRIND is about one thing and one thing only...GRINDIN' OUT DAT FUNKIN' NUT!!
title: Grind 1
